"Pangea Real Estate practices on-going dynamic pricing for all operated units.
Unit promotions, discounts, and monthly rent quotes are subject to change based on day of month, current inventory, and additional market factors.
As such, any promotions, discounts, or monthly rent quotes are valid only at the time presented to a prospective tenant and can expire anytime thereafter."
